sentence: NOW WATCH: Trump rages against Brian Kemp for purportedly conspiring against Marjorie Taylor Greene

title: 'Shoes dropping like hail': Here's how Jan 6 committee's 'bombshells' have gone off even before the final report

sentence: It's as if Brent is oblivious to Glenn Younkin winning without Trump and Brian Kemp excelling in spite of his rift with the man.

title: The Press Is Actively Changing the Language to Push Its Abortion Agenda
